name: The batte of moods
description:
A game where you have to get a key card and reduce the ghost pop using music.

Each ghost is a bad mood like fear and you need to defeat it with good moods like happy and calm  do help them go to the heavens and get a key card with info on it

Credits:

The game was made in rpgmaker mv  with music by  https://hababaman.itch.io/

check credits page in game for more credits
